Blog.post: Well, I recently recieved braces..... Food gets stuck in between them..which is a real pain.. But, I get my license in 4 DAYS!!
Well, my checks came in the mail today. And that's it..yep 14 days left untill I get my drivers license!!

Well, today I recieved my ATM card in the mail...( Oh did I forget to mention I now have a checking account!) Yeah.....anway..don't want to sound all conceded now. Oh, and I get my drivers license in 15 days!! Yeah...I think that's it...yeah it is....

Well, last weekend was actually...alright, compared to my summer so far. My best friend John came over on Friday after we saw I' Robot and Spiderman 2. I thought that I'Robot would've been great if it weren't for that damn slow motion matrix crap. I also wasn't to crazy about Will Smith either. Anyway, after I'Robot, we went straight into Spiderman 2. Now, Spiderman 2 was a hell of a whole lot better than the first. I thought it was cool for Mary Jane to actually find out who Spiderman was, and it was awesome when that one guy, I forget his name, found that secret room with his fathers mischievous toys. Anyway, Saturday I opened up and closed my dad's shop (Cinerius Computers) all by myself. John kept me company for a while, then decided to head off home... A few hours later, Justin and Jared came by, and hung out till I closed. After I closed, we headed off towards Lake Jackson and picked up Michael and James. Jared dressed as a pirate and Michael dressed as his oriental slave. We went to the mall and met up with Kendal and Chris (a.k.a. Snakpac) and just did stuff, I don't know, I forget...then we ate at Cici's Pizza. Jared dropped everyone at thier house, including me...then I did some stuff..and when Sunday came..I had a Lord of the Rings marathon with no breaks..well bathroom of course.... ...and there was my fantastic weekend all in a nut shell.

Well, I give up on my own blog design..(for now). Anyway, I recently had four extractions done ( that's four teeth pulled) and had separators put in my back teeth...somewhat painful. I'll be getting braces pretty soon. I am both scared and excited...
A Fun Place, A Happy Place....Xenetron welcomes all. I'll soon change the blog design, because all the other blog designs are...crap
